page.title: 03TOPSHAM'S LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: The River Exe provides entertainment for boating and fishing enthusiasts throughout the year.The football and rugby clubs are active during the winter months. In the summer, the bowling green provides entertainment for players and spectators. Just opposite this there are the tennis courts and swimming pool. The open air swimming pool is heated with solar power from panels under the tennis courts. There is a recreation ground next to the river which has a children's playground and plenty of space for football and school sports. In the Matthews Hall are facilities for plays and concerts, bingo, badminton and small exhibitions. For evening entertainment adults can visit one of Topsham's many public houses or restaurants.
